original_text: When a person works to get money, it is right for him to receive his money. That money is not a gift. It is what that person ought to receive as a result of his work.
korean_text: 일하는 자에게는 그 삯이 은혜로 여겨지지 아니하고 보수로 여겨지거니와

sentences.original_text: When a person works to get money,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 돈을 벌기 위해 일할 때,

sentences.original_text: it is right for him to receive his money.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 돈을 받는 것은 마땅하다.

sentences.original_text: That money is not a gift.
It is what that person ought to receive
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 사람이 받아야만 하는 것인데,

sentences.original_text: as a result of his work.
